Prerequisites¶

PyKayacIM is compatible with both Python 2.7 and 3.x. It was tested on CPython (i.e. the regular python) 2.7.10 and 3.4.3.

The package Python-Future is required by PyKayacIM. Execute pip install future to install this package using pip.

Note

To use PyKayacIM on Python <2.7 additional packages such as argparse may be necessary.

To make use of PyKayacIM you should have a valid im.kayac.com account. To activate one, access the website im.kayac.com (in English) or its Japanese version, and follow the instructions.
